channel.title: HTSeq on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in HTSeq on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 10: Capstone & Final Recap
item.description: Master the RNA-Seq pipeline with this capstone recap. Includes practical examples, file structure tips, and command-line snippets to help you implement each step efficiently.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 6: From BAM to Count Matrices with featureCounts & HTSeq
item.description: Generate RNA-Seq count matrices with featureCounts and HTSeq. Learn about annotation matching, strandedness, sorting, and best practices for accurate read quantification.
